scripts.test: yarn prep:test && yarn codegen && graph test
scripts.deploy: yarn prep:prod && yarn codegen && graph build --network mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ graphprotocol/mainnet-epoch-block-oracle
scripts.deploy-l2: yarn prep:prod-l2 && yarn codegen && graph build --network arbitrum-one && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ juanmardefago/arbitrum-epoch-block-oracle
scripts.deploy-staging: yarn prep:staging && yarn codegen && graph build --network goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ juanmardefago/block-oracle
scripts.deploy-staging-l2: yarn prep:staging-l2 && yarn codegen && graph build --network arbitrum-goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ juanmardefago/arb-goerli-epoch-block-oracle
scripts.deploy-local: yarn codegen && graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:${IPFS_PORT} edgeandnode/block-oracle --version-label 0.1.0
scripts.prep:local: mustache ./config/local.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ./config/local.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts
scripts.prep:test: mustache ./config/test.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ./config/test.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts

scripts.prep:staging: mustache ./config/staging.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ./config/staging.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts
scripts.prep:staging-l2: mustache ./config/staging-l2.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ./config/staging-l2.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts
